description: Retrieves information about an account that's associated with an Amazon Macie administrator account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Amazon Macie resource that the request applies to.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID for the account.

nested_items.name: administratorAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID for the administrator account.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account.

nested_items.name: email
nested_items.description: The email address for the account. This value is null if the account is associated with the administrator account through Organizations.

nested_items.name: invitedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and extended ISO 8601 format, when an Amazon Macie membership invitation was last sent to the account. This value is null if a Macie membership invitation hasn't been sent to the account.

nested_items.name: masterAccountId
nested_items.description: (Deprecated) The Amazon Web Services account ID for the administrator account. This property has been replaced by the administratorAccountId property and is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: relationshipStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the relationship between the account and the administrator account.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and extended ISO 8601 format, of the most recent change to the status of the relationship between the account and the administrator account.
